page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: In the{Meadows}there is a mixture of old and new houses. Most of the houses are terraced houses, especially the old ones. There are quite a few semi-detached houses but hardly any detached. There are some flats above the shopping Precinct. Most of the old houses do not have gardens, they have yards. I live in an old house. It is about 75 years old. Downstairs there is a hallway, small bathroom, a big dining room, a long kitchen and a front room. Upstairs there are three big bedrooms. To keep us warm we have two radiators and a gas fire downstairs. Upstairs we have three radiators.
